column3: I had a hand me down ride painted rattle can red
column4: Second hand tires with poor boy tread
column5: Made a lot of almost love in the bed of that
column6: Truck that got stuck a lot
column7: Just letter jacket boys singing Jerry Jeff songs
column8: Drinking everything we could get our hands on
column9: Learning bout right by doin it wrong
column13: And we spent what little bit of money we had
column14: On wintergreen Skoal and main street gas
column15: Go get your girl,, go make the drag
column16: If youre lucky you can take her cross the rail road tracks
column17: Where the man in the moon works his magic
column18: On the second runner up of the 4H pageant
column20: That was fourteen hundred and fifty two beers ago
column23: Skipped that town on my birthday
column24: For eighteen years I was headed that way
column25: Where old red stopped I just stayed
column26: In a room without a view
column27: I met a one look girl in a two bit bar
column28: I had a place,, she had a car
column29: I won her heart with my guitar
column30: I sang her the homesick blues bout
